entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Buchans
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:56 PM NST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Millertown 3:30 PM NST Sunday 15 January 2023
Temperature: -1.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.7 kPa rising
Humidity: 94 %
Dewpoint: -2.0°C
Wind: 0 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Snow or ice pellets beginning before morning. Risk of freezing drizzle this evening and overnight. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northeast 30 gusting to 50 this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Freezing rain mixed with rain. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Snow or ice pellets changing to freezing rain or rain in the morning then to periods of rain in the afternoon. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of rain or drizzle. Temperature rising to 8 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of rain mixed with drizzle. Amount 5 mm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature rising to 8 by morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Showers. High 9.
entry.summary: Showers. High 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 15 January 2023
